name: personal-crypto-escrow-backend
description: Manually creating backend for CryptoEscrow web app

scripts.test:bridge: npm run test:bridge-unit && npm run test:bridge-integration
scripts.test:lifi:unit: NODE_ENV=test TEST_TYPE=unit NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js tests/unit/lifiService.test.js --detectOpenHandles --coverage --collectCoverageFrom=src/services/lifiService.js
scripts.test:cross-chain:unit: NODE_ENV=test TEST_TYPE=unit node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --config jest.unit.config.js tests/unit/walletRoutes.test.js tests/unit/lifiService.test.js --detectOpenHandles --coverage
scripts.test:cross-chain:all: npm run test:cross-chain:unit && npm run test:cross-chain:integration
scripts.test:e2e: NODE_ENV=e2e_test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:5004 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 RPC_URL=http://localhost:8545 node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --config jest.e2e.config.js --runInBand --detectOpenHandles
scripts._run-jest-basic-e2e-delayed: NODE_ENV=e2e_test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:5004 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 RPC_URL=http://localhost:8545 node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --config jest.e2e.config.js src/__tests__/e2e/basicFlow.e2e.test.js --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts._run-jest-negative-e2e-delayed: sleep 20 && NODE_ENV=e2e_test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:5004 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 RPC_URL=http://localhost:8545 node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --config jest.e2e.config.js src/__tests__/e2e/negativeFlow.e2e.test.js --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts._run-jest-security-e2e-delayed: sleep 20 && NODE_ENV=e2e_test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:5004 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 RPC_URL=http://localhost:8545 node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --config jest.e2e.config.js src/__tests__/e2e/security.e2e.test.js --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts._run-jest-user-e2e-delayed: sleep 20 && NODE_ENV=e2e_test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:5004 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 RPC_URL=http://localhost:8545 node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --config jest.e2e.config.js src/__tests__/e2e/userFlow.e2e.test.js --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts.test:all: npm run kill-ports && concurrently -k --names "HARDHAT,EMULATOR,TESTS" --success first "npm:start-hardhat-e2e" "npm:start-emulators-e2e" "npm:_run-jest-all-delayed" && npm run kill-ports
scripts.test:all:fast: npm run kill-ports && concurrently -k --names "HARDHAT,EMULATOR,TESTS" --success first "npm:start-hardhat-e2e" "npm:start-emulators-e2e" "npm:_run-jest-all-fast-delayed" && npm run kill-ports
scripts._run-jest-all-delayed: sleep 20 && NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:5004 FIREBASE_STORAGE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9199 node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --coverage
scripts._run-jest-all-fast-delayed: sleep 20 && NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:5004 FIREBASE_STORAGE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9199 node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --maxWorkers=4 --detectOpenHandles --coverage
scripts.test:e2e:basic: npm run kill-ports && concurrently -k --names "HARDHAT,EMULATOR,TESTS" --success first "npm:start-hardhat-e2e" "npm:start-emulators-e2e" "npm:_run-jest-basic-e2e-delayed" && npm run kill-ports
scripts.test:e2e:negative: npm run kill-ports && concurrently -k --names "HARDHAT,EMULATOR,TESTS" --success first "npm:start-hardhat-e2e" "npm:start-emulators-e2e" "npm:_run-jest-negative-e2e-delayed" && npm run kill-ports
scripts.test:e2e:security-full: npm run kill-ports && concurrently -k --names "HARDHAT,EMULATOR,TESTS" --success first "npm:start-hardhat-e2e" "npm:start-emulators-e2e" "npm:_run-jest-security-e2e-delayed" && npm run kill-ports
scripts.test:e2e:user-full: npm run kill-ports && concurrently -k --names "HARDHAT,EMULATOR,TESTS" --success first "npm:start-hardhat-e2e" "npm:start-emulators-e2e" "npm:_run-jest-user-e2e-delayed" && npm run kill-ports
scripts.test:e2e:user: npm run kill-ports && concurrently -k --names "HARDHAT,EMULATOR,TESTS" --success first "npm:start-hardhat-e2e" "npm:start-emulators-e2e" "npm:_run-jest-user-e2e-delayed" && npm run kill-ports
scripts.test:e2e:security: npm run kill-ports && concurrently -k --names "HARDHAT,EMULATOR,TESTS" --success first "npm:start-hardhat-e2e" "npm:start-emulators-e2e" "npm:_run-jest-security-e2e-delayed" && npm run kill-ports
scripts.test:e2e:universal:api: NODE_ENV=e2e_test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js test/e2e/api/transaction-creation.test.js --config test/e2e/jest.e2e.config.js --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --testTimeout=120000
scripts.test:e2e:tenderly:api: NODE_ENV=e2e_test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js test/e2e/api/transaction-creation.test.js --config jest.e2e.config.js --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --testTimeout=120000
scripts.test:e2e:tenderly:demo: NODE_ENV=e2e_test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js test/e2e/services/tenderly-demo.test.js --config jest.e2e.config.js --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --testTimeout=120000
scripts.test:services:emulator: NODE_ENV=test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:5004 FIREBASE_STORAGE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9199 node node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js src/services/__tests__ --detectOpenHandles --coverage
scripts.kill-ports: kill-port 8545 || echo 'Port 8545 not in use' && kill-port 5004 || echo 'Port 5004 not in use' && kill-port 9099 || echo 'Port 9099 not in use' && kill-port 9199 || echo 'Port 9199 not in use' && kill-port 5173 || echo 'Port 5173 not in use'
scripts.audit:api:basic: echo 'ZAP CLI scan - start your server first with npm start'
scripts.audit:full: npm run audit:smart-contracts && echo 'Smart contract audit complete. Run OWASP ZAP manually for API scanning.'
